osx.command: rm -rf build; mkdir build; cd build; clang++ -g -I ${workspaceRoot}/include/ -I ${workspaceRoot}/lib/ -framework OpenGL -lglew -lglfw ${workspaceRoot}/src/cpp/*.cpp -o opengl-app

linux.command: rm -rf build; mkdir build; cd build; g++ -g -I ${workspaceRoot}/include/ ${workspaceRoot}/src/cpp/*.cpp -lGL -lGLEW -lglfw -o opengl-app
